solution_line_template: She gets a double espresso for ${espresso_cost} every morning and an iced coffee for ${iced_coffee_cost} in the afternoon so she spends {espresso_cost}+{iced_coffee_cost} = $<<{espresso_cost}+{iced_coffee_cost}={daily_coffee_cost}>>{daily_coffee_cost} every day on coffee
After {num_days} days, she spends {num_days}*{daily_coffee_cost} = $<<{num_days}*{daily_coffee_cost}={total_coffee_cost}>>{total_coffee_cost} on coffee
